articles.content: Its fair to say the jury is still out on Rangers USA loan pair James Sands and Malik Tillman, but as they team up with John Lundstram against Aberdeen, does it give a glimpse into the future at Ibrox… [+2161 chars]

articles.title: Erik ten Hag's response to Martin Tyler before West Ham win sums up Man Utd boss - The Mirror
articles.description: Erik ten Hag had a brief chat with commentary legend Martin Tyler before Manchester United's 1-0 victory over West Ham on Sunday, and the few words which he used summed up his methodical character
articles.content:
Erik ten Hag isn't indulging in any praise as he rebuilds Manchester United, politely brushing off Martin Tyler 's kind words before guiding the Red Devils to another win.

articles.title: Ferrari 'clearly protecting something' at Mexico City Grand Prix - Planet F1
articles.description: Martin Brundle believes Ferrari were "protecting something" in Mexico as they "were simply not at the races".
articles.content:
Former Formula 1 driver turned pundit Martin Brundle says something forced Ferrari into conservation mode in Mexico.

articles.description: Hugo Bueno has heaped praise on ‘incredible’ Ruben Neves after the Wolves skipper’s superb equaliser against Brentford.

articles.description: Rhys Priestland is in the frame to claim the Wales No. 10 jersey for the autumn curtain-raiser against the All Blacks
articles.content:
